title: Epilogue to the Bilgewater event
body:
HELLO!

Who ever read the epilogue of the Bilgewater series thingy (something), then they may have seen the last sentence!
'I've got work to do'
SO, I think there will be another champion from Bilgewater! The 'Broken Man' I think it was.
ANYWAY MY THANKS GOES TO ALL THE PEOPLE WHO HELPED MAKE THAT READING SERIES NOT ONLY AWESOME BUT ALSO DAUNTING WHEN MISS FORTUNE CAME IN :D :D
^
(Caps used because I'm happy, not screaming)

replies.body:
It's not a new champ.
It's Gangplank.
All of his skins will be changed to represent the arm he lost. A special skin with the old arm is available if you play him before the event ends or you already played him (i believe this means played between his reworked release and his "death" in client, which i luckily did).
Check the news if you don't believe me.

> [{quoted}](name=Ediwir,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Y8IcHqjk,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-03T08:55:52.679+0000)
>
> It's not a new champ.
> It's Gangplank.
> All of his skins will be changed to represent the arm he lost. A special skin with the old arm is available if you play him before the event ends or you already played him (i believe this means played between his reworked release and his "death" in client, which i luckily did).
> Check the news if you don't believe me.

I wonder if Miss Fortune lost if Riot would have removed her breasts?





HAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAH I doubt it, Riot is sexist pricks.

> [{quoted}](name=Bipolar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Y8IcHqjk,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-08-03T11:37:08.354+0000)
>
> I wonder if Miss Fortune lost if Riot would have removed her breasts?
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> HAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAH I doubt it, Riot is sexist pricks.

Now write that again, this time in English.

> [{quoted}](name=noogai,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Y8IcHqjk,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-08-03T11:56:54.814+0000)
>
> ... You're an idiot, go away.

Rather be an idiot than bronze trash like yourself.
Decimating garbage shouldn't be this easy, but it is.
Some priorities you have there. I place my own personal intelligence above digital ranking systems, but that's probably because i'm not an idiot.

> [{quoted}](name=noogai,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Y8IcHqjk,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-03T13:04:54.912+0000)
>
> Some priorities you have there. I place my own personal intelligence above digital ranking systems, but that's probably because **i'm** not an idiot.

Alright.

But I thought that Gangplank was dead?
But then again this is a game, so anything can happen

Yes, you thought so.
Everyone in Bilgewater thought so.
But he's back, he lost an arm, and he's angry as fuck.

And _he's got work to do._
